arcane_hostility.title: Arcane Hostility
trait.arcane_hostility.anti_magic.desc: Being attacked by a magic summon will cancel their magic, getting them unsummoned.
trait.arcane_hostility.blood_school_immu: Immune to all damage caused by blood spells.
trait.arcane_hostility.eldritch_school_i: Immune to all damage caused by eldritch spells.
trait.arcane_hostility.ender_school_immu: Immune to all damage caused by ender spells.
trait.arcane_hostility.evocation_school_: Immune to all damage caused by evocation spells.
trait.arcane_hostility.fire_school_immun: Immune to all damage caused by fire spells.
trait.arcane_hostility.holy_school_immun: Immune to all damage caused by holy spells.
trait.arcane_hostility.ice_school_immuni: Immune to all damage caused by ice spells.
trait.arcane_hostility.lightning_school_: Immune to all damage caused by lightning spells.
trait.arcane_hostility.magic_rebound.des: All magic projectiles will bounce back.
trait.arcane_hostility.nature_school_imm: Immune to all damage caused by nature spells.
